entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Lucky Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:49 AM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lucky Lake 08:00 AM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022
Temperature: -2.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 85 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -4.1°C
Wind: NW 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of freezing rain. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of freezing rain beginning this morning. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this morning. Wind becoming southeast 30 near noon. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 6 this morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of freezing rain. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of freezing rain early this evening. Wind south 20 km/h becoming west 30 near midnight. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 8 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind west 30 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 8 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 20 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022
